gui.form.base

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.form.base.FormObject
      • gui.form.base.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChangeSubject, FunctionTypable, java.lang.Comparable<FormObject>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuHeader, OkButton

    public abstract class Button
extends FormObject
implements FunctionTypable
    Button that can be added to a Form
